page.title: 07HOLTON AREA: CUSTOMS
page.content: Harvest Suppers are held after a Harvest Church service.The food is mostly given by the participants & money raised from ticket sales given to Church or Charity.The Pub holds an auction of produce donated by locals, in aid of charity.In Lissington families with children meet on Bonfire night and share the cost of fireworks, sausages & jacket potatoes.In Holton a Bonfire party is given in aid of the Labour Party.At Christmas all 3 Churches hold a Carol Service followed by mince pies. At Holton a group go around the village carol singing. As in most communities it is generally the same group of people who support these annual events.
